Notes: 6.1KB. Term sheet analysis with red flags and key terms is investor-native content. Stage-specific fundraising metrics benchmarks complement other fundraising skills with analytical lens.

Name: Monthly Investor Updates Skill
Description: Investor update best practices: TL;DR section structure, metrics snapshots, challenges framing, specific asks format, tone guidelines, update cadence recommendations.
Notes: 5.5KB. Helps VCs coach portfolio companies on writing better updates. No existing skill covers investor update methodology.

Name: Fundraising Process Skill (oldwinter)
Description: 8-step fundraising workflow producing a complete Fundraising Pack: raise decision memo, round design brief, pitch narrative, investor pipeline/tracker, outreach scripts, DD checklist, operating cadence. Tight scope definitions and quality gates.
Notes: 8.2KB. Exceptionally well-structured process skill. Raise decision memo framework and investor pipeline tracker methodology directly relevant for VC portfolio support.

Name: Founder Sales Sprint Skill
Description: Founder Sales Sprint Pack: ICP wedge, outreach sequences, diagnostic discovery scripts, decision enablement assets ('no decision' as #1 competitor), white-glove activation plans. 7-step workflow with quality gates.
Notes: 8.2KB. Diagnostic discovery methodology and decision enablement framework useful for VCs helping early-stage portfolio companies build first sales motion.

Name: Startup Metrics Framework Skill
Description: Deep-dive into SaaS, marketplace, consumer, and B2B metrics frameworks. Burn multiple analysis, Rule of 40, cohort retention, unit economics benchmarks. Structured reference for investment evaluation.
Notes: Index-only. Covers SaaS/marketplace/consumer/B2B metrics, Rule of 40, burn multiple. Strong VC reference with no downloaded counterpart.

Name: Founder Playbook Skill
Description: Comprehensive founder coaching methodology (581 lines): GROW framework, red flag detection (tar pit ideas, AI FOMO, commodity AI trap), structured problem-solving workflows, milestone tracking.
Notes: Index-only. Exceptional quality coaching methodology with VC-useful red flag detection (tar pit ideas, AI FOMO). Founder-coaching tool, not investor tool.
